text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Board" means the Board of Directors of the Corporation.

section.section: "Bond" means a bond or note issued on behalf of the Corporation.

text.section: "County Commissioners" means the Board of County Commissioners of Washington County.
"Improve" means to add, alter, construct, equip, expand, extend, improve, install, reconstruct, rehabilitate, remodel, or repair.
"Improvement" means addition, alteration, construction, equipping, expansion, extension, improvement, installation, reconstruction, rehabilitation, remodeling, or repair.

section.section: "Person" has the meaning stated in § 9-101 of this article.

"Project" means an undertaking to establish economic activity on property to be conveyed to the Corporation from the United States Army at Fort Ritchie, Maryland:
for any industrial, commercial, or business purpose; and
whether or not a facility or property used or useful in connection with the undertaking:
is or will be used for profit or not for profit;
is located on a single site or multiple sites; or
may be financed by bonds, the interest on which is exempt from taxation under federal law.

"Revenues" means:
the income, revenue, and other money the Corporation receives from or in connection with a project; and
all other income of the Corporation.
"Revenues" includes grants, rentals, rates, fees, and charges for the use of services furnished or available.
